releaseNotes.title: Money Moves ðŸ‘€
releaseNotes.description: The folks at Shiftrle.gg have been busy. They bought Octane.gg a couple months ago so I needed to make some changes to how news articles were added to the app.

items.title: Where do you get your data?
items.text: Boost Control is powered by [Shiftrle.gg](https://shiftrle.gg). Shift bought Octane.gg, so they are one and the same now!

items.title: Nothing seems to be loading. What gives?
items.text: Our service is dependent on Shiftrle.gg's API. Their servers tend to get overloaded on competition weekends.

items.title: Why can't I find player/team/event?
items.text: If it isn't on Shiftrle.gg, it won't be listed here.

items.title: Can you feature my article?
items.text: Potentially. Reach out to me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/boostctrl).

items.title: Can you add [feature]?
items.text: Probably! Reach out to me on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/boostctrl).

notes.releaseNote: Revamped match results, including overtimes and event stats.
Search for teams, players, and events
Updated news sources to reflect ShiftRLE's acquisition of Octane.gg
